lead_paragraph: As men’s basketball coaches are continually recycled, the top women’s coach, Connecticut’s Geno Auriemma, stays in place and just keeps winning.
snippet: As men’s basketball coaches are continually recycled, the top women’s coach, Connecticut’s Geno Auriemma, stays in place and just keeps winning.

headline.main: On the Coaching Carousel, All Is Forgiven
headline.print_headline: On the Coaching Carousel, All Is Forgiven
